body.name: HP 17 Laptop, 17.3” HD+ Display, 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1125G4 Processor, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Webcam, Windows 11 Home, Silver
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by ComputersUSA.
features: 【High Speed RAM And Enormous Space】32GB high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once; 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive allows to fast bootup and data transfer
【Processor】11th Gen Intel Core i3-1125G4 Processor (4 Cores, 8 Threads, 8MB L3 Smart Cache, Clockspeed at 2.0 GHz, Up to 3.7 GHz at Max Turbo Frequency)

【Tech Specs】1 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate, 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate, 1 x HDMI 1.4b, 1 x Headphone/Microphone Combo; Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
body.description: Key Features and Benefits:CPU: 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1125G4 Processor (4 Cores, 8 Threads, 8MB L3 Smart Cache, Clockspeed at 2.0 GHz, Up to 3.7 GHz at Max Turbo Frequency)Memory: Up to 32GB DDR4 RAMHard Drive: Up to 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State DriveOperating System: Windows 11 HomeGraphics: Intel UHD GraphicsDisplay: 17.3" diagonal, HD+ (1600 x 900), anti-glare, 250 nits, 60% NTSCBacklit Keyboard: NoPorts:1 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate1 x HDMI 1.4b1 x Headphone/Microphone ComboAudio: Dual SpeakersWebcam: HP True Vision 720p HD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphonesWireless Connectivity: Wi-Fi and BluetoothDimensions: 15.78" x 10.15" x 0.78"Weight: 4.6 lbsColor: Silver

productInformation.value: #382 in Computers & Accessories (See Top 100 in Computers & Accessories) #22 in Traditional Laptop Computers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this laptop because my old laptop is starting to"crap out" the only thing I don't like about this laptop that I thought I had included in my search was that it is not a touch screen but I can live with that otherwise it is a great laptop it has Windows 11 and products related and I could not be more pleased with my purchase. It is lightweight speedy and sturdy as well! It charged very fast and stayed charged for at least 10 hours so I could not be more pleased! As far as the amount of storage I did go smaller than I always have but I do have an external hard drive in the off chance that I decide to save anything which I typically don't intend to do other than a few pictures so I should be covered as far as storage goes! This laptop was the best value and had everything I wanted other than the touch screen you should purchase this laptop if you are in the market for something that is very reliable and sturdy and has a keypad for the numbers which was very important to me the keyboard is also backlit which is another important selling point to me this computer is so easy to use and easy to set up I'm glad I made this purchase it is hard to find a good laptop for under $600 and this most certainly is a good laptop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good
reviews.reviewText: It was time to replace my six-year-old HP 15" laptop. After quite a bit of research, I decided I wanted the HP 17" model with as much SSD capacity RAM as possible. This one more than filled the bill with 1TB SSD and 32 GB RAM. I was a little apprehensive about buying it online after reading several negative reviews about the seller (RightBuy Electronics). My experience was flawless. The PC was promptly shipped to my winter home on the Florida Gulf Coast via UPS Express Overnight Shipping. It arrived just as described and in excellent condition. Understandably, a receipt signature was required. The UPS driver was already preparing to leave a non-deliverable note on our door when my wife failed to answer the door within 15 seconds. Fortunately, she caught him before he could flee.The setup was pretty easy. There has been a little bit of a learning curve since this was my first experience with Windows 11. But after just a few days it's working fine. It is much faster than my old laptop and the large non non-glare screen is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars poor volume and i wish the keyboard lit up
reviews.reviewText: overall the pc has performed well. I wish the volume was better and the keyboard is horrible without full light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality system and a good value.......
reviews.reviewText: 16 GB RAM and 1 TB SSD .... Very fast response/loading. Very nice screen quality. Audio_ well, it's a laptop, and ext speakers or headset make a world of difference as with any laptop, I've experienced. On it's own the sound quality is not bad. Highly recommend this computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality machine, very fast.
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves it. We got the 16gb memory version, It is well worth the extra few bucks for the memory. No issues to speak of after roughly 4 months of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY - SELLER DOESN'T STAND BEHIND PURCHASE
reviews.reviewText: The description of this product says it comes with Windows 11 Pro. Got my new laptop, was loving it, then about 3 weeks after I got it, my windows says I need to activate it. I go to settings and it won't activate. Upon further investigation, I find out the product key loaded on my new laptop is for Windows 11 Home. I contacted the seller, they asked me for my order number, I gave that to them. Then they asked what assistance I needed. I explained my issue and they have NEVER helped me! I have messaged them 3 times and they have ghosted me. They have not replied back at all. Amazon was no help either the 2 times I've contacted them. This seller is making false claims and they will not stand behind their product. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM. BUYER BEWARE. HORRIBLE - THEY TELL YOU YOU ARE BUYING ONE THING THING then a week from the time frame when you can return your laptop, the Windows you thought you purchased with your new computer suddenly stops working and the seller WILL NOT EVEN CONTACT YOU BACK. THEY ARE LYING TO YOU JUST TO GET YOUR MONEY. DO NOT, REPEAT, DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER. YOU WILL REGRET IT!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dedicated Digital Audio Workstation
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a laptop dedicated to my (work in progress) basement studio. I'm leery of buying used laptops, so I shopped for new.For the price, this totally fit the bill. 16GB ram, 1TB solid state drive, Windows 11, and fresh install of Reaper. The 17" display really helps.Its does ship in Windows "S" mode. I had no issues turning that "feature" off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hp 17 inch computer
reviews.reviewText: This is a great computer and I am very pleased with the computer light weight and fast. Hp is my favorite brand of computer. It arrived on time and easy to set up.
